'''Rock-Steady Adventurer''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Liyue: The Harbor of Stone and Contracts]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in [[Liyue]].
